price: 4. Misna ku celi aragga mar labaad, araggaagu adiga buu kugu soo noqon isagoo dulleysan oo daallan.
arabic: ثُمَّ ٱرۡجِعِ ٱلۡبَصَرَ كَرَّتَيۡنِ يَنقَلِبۡ إِلَيۡكَ ٱلۡبَصَرُ خَاسِئٗا وَهُوَ حَسِيرٞ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: thumma ir'jiʿi al-baṣara karratayni yanqalib ilayka al-baṣaru khāsi-an wahuwa ḥasīrun
